pm_suryaghar_residential.name: PM Surya Ghar – Vendor–Consumer Agreement (Residential)
pm_suryaghar_residential.template_html:
VENDOR–CONSUMER AGREEMENT

This agreement is executed on {{execution_date}} between {{vendor_name}}, {{vendor_address}} (hereinafter referred to as Vendor) and {{consumer_name}}, Consumer Account No. {{consumer_account_no}}, residing at {{consumer_address}} (site: {{site_address}}).

The consumer agrees to install a rooftop solar plant of {{kwp}} kWp at the above premises under PM Surya Ghar scheme terms and applicable DISCOM/MNRE guidelines.

The total project amount agreed is {{amount_total}}.

Both parties confirm that they have read and understood all terms and conditions and agree to execute the work and payment obligations accordingly.


For Vendor


Signature		For Consumer


Signature
